mainBoard.name: Thurid, Mare of Destiny
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever you cast a Pegasus, Unicorn, or Horse creature spell, copy it. (The copy becomes a token.)
Other Pegasi, Unicorns, and Horses you control get +1/+1.

rulings.text: As a copy of a permanent spell resolves, it's put onto the battlefield as a token rather than putting a copy of the spell onto the battlefield. The rules that apply to a permanent spell becoming a permanent apply to a copy of a spell becoming a token.
The token that a resolving copy of a permanent spell becomes isn't "created." Abilities that refer to a token being created won't interact with the copy resolving.

Thurid's triggered ability and the copy it creates will resolve before the spell that caused it to trigger. They resolve even if that spell is countered or otherwise leaves the stack without resolving.
Thurid's triggered ability doesn't trigger if a Pegasus, Unicorn, or Horse creature is put onto the battlefield without being cast.
Thurid's triggered ability will copy only creature spells, not noncreature kindred spells, even if those spells have the Pegasus, Unicorn, or Horse types.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Banishing Light
mainBoard.originalText: When Banishing Light enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners' graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist. When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled.
If Banishing Light leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the target permanent won't be exiled.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is exiled this way, its owner chooses what it will enchant as it returns to the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn't target anything (so it could be attached to a permanent with shroud, for example), but the Aura's enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can't legally be attached to anything, it remains in exile for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Celestial Unicorn
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Celestial Unicorn.

rulings.text: Each creature with lifelink dealing combat damage causes a separate life-gaining event. For example, if two creatures you control with lifelink deal combat damage at the same time, Ajani's Pridemate's ability will trigger twice. However, if a single creature you control with lifelink deals combat damage to multiple creatures, players, planeswalkers, and/or battles at the same time (perhaps because it has trample or was blocked by more than one creature), the ability will trigger only once.
If Celestial Unicorn is dealt lethal damage at the same time that you gain life, it won't receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.
If you gain an amount of life "for each" of something or "equal to the number" of something, that life is gained as one event and Celestial Unicorn's ability triggers only once.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, life gained by your teammate won't cause Celestial Unicorn's ability to trigger, even though it caused your team's life total to increase.
The ability of Celestial Unicorn triggers just once for each life-gaining event, whether it's 1 life from Dazzling Angel or 4 life from Apothecary Stomper.

mainBoard.flavorText: The sacred feathers of the pegasus are said to have healing powers.

mainBoard.flavorText: Chosen by Heliod, Daxos approached the pegasus without fear, and rode it without saddle or reins.

foreignData.flavorText: Als Auserwählter von Heliod näherte sich Daxos dem Pegasus ohne Furcht und ritt ihn ohne Sattel oder Zügel.
foreignData.name: Sonnenmähnenpegasus
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
{1}{W}: Der Sonnenmähnenpegasus erhält Wachsamkeit und Lebensverknüpfung bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Er wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt. Schaden, der von ihm zugefügt wird, lässt dich entsprechend viele Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten.)

foreignData.flavorText: El elegido de Heliod, Daxos, se acercó al pegaso sin temor, y cabalgó sobre él sin necesidad de silla ni riendas.
foreignData.name: Pegaso crin solar
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
{1}{W}: El Pegaso crin solar gana las habilidades de vigilancia y vínculo vital hasta el final del turno. (Esta criatura no se gira al atacar. El daño hecho por esta criatura también hace que ganes esa misma cantidad de vidas.)

foreignData.flavorText: Choisi par Héliode, Daxos s'approcha sans crainte du pégase et l'enfourcha sans selle ni rênes.
foreignData.name: Pégase à la crinière solaire
foreignData.text:
Vol
{1}{W} : Le Pégase à la crinière solaire acquiert la vigilance et le lien de vie jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Attaquer avec cette créature ne la fait pas s'engager. Les blessures infligées par cette créature vous font aussi gagner autant de points de vie.)

foreignData.flavorText: Scelto da Eliod, Daxos si avvicinò al pegaso senza timore e lo montò senza sella né redini.
foreignData.name: Pegaso dalla Criniera Solare
foreignData.text:
Volare

foreignData.flavorText: ヘリオッドに選ばれしダクソスは、恐れることなくペガサスに歩みより、鞍も手綱もなしに跨った。
foreignData.name: 陽光たてがみのペガサス

mainBoard.flavorText: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Blüte der Wildblumen richtet sich hier nicht nach den Jahreszeiten, sondern nach den Gezeiten der Magie.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Heide kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Las flores salvajes de aquí no florecen según las estaciones, sino según los altibajos y el flujo de la magia.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Brezal floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Ici, les fleurs sauvages s'épanouissent non pas au gré des saisons mais au gré des flux de magie.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
La Prairie prospère arrive engagée. Au moment où elle arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: I fiori selvatici qui non sbocciano in base alle stagioni, ma seguendo il fluire della magia.
foreignData.name: Brughiera Florida
foreignData.text:
La Brughiera Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 季節ではなく魔法の干満に従って野生の花が咲く。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
興隆する荒野はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Heath enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
